thread.title: Ghana receives appreciation from UNWTO for hosting World Tourism ConferenceTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Ghana receives appreciation from UNWTO for hosting World Tourism ConferenceTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Ghana receives appreciation from UNWTO for hosting World Tourism ConferenceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Ghana receives appreciation from UNWTO for hosting World Tourism Conference Published on : Tuesday, September 15, 2015
Ghana had once again shown the world how Africa could deliver, given the opportunity to host such events, mentioned a letter signed by the Secretary General of the UNWTO, Dr Taleb Rifai, and addressed to the Minister of Tourism, Culture and Creative Arts, Elizabeth Ofosu-Adjare.
Ghana who successfully hosted the UNWTO Regional Conference on Brand Africa received appreciation from the UNWTO.
“I would like to sincerely thank you for providing the tourism leaders of African countries and the world with a platform to come together and engage in interactive discussions on advancing tourism growth through a positive brand in Africa and also for accepting our invitation.
“Ghana has hosted the world and shown leadership on the African Continent by the organisation of the conference,” the letter said.
Ghana recently hosted the first ever UNWTO regional conference on Branding Africa’s Image. The conference was attended by 40 countries from around the world.
